trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> instances and is used for properties whose <xref:System.Type> is a collection.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula uma coleção de <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> instâncias e é utilizado para as propriedades cujos <xref:System.Type>é uma coleção.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueCollection"></xref> class as a sub-property to the specified parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueCollection"> </xref> classe como uma propriedade secundárias para o principal especificado <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento principal <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object into the collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto da coleção de <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> for the added object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> para o objeto adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Notifies listeners of dynamic changes to the collection, such as when items get added and removed or the whole list is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica os serviços de escuta de dinâmicas alterações à coleção, tal como quando itens obterem adicionados e removidos ou a lista completa está atualizada.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de itens numa coleção de <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> number of items.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>número de itens.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed <xref:Systems.Collections.IEnumerator> that iterates through the collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um tipo seguro <xref:Systems.Collections.IEnumerator>que itera através da coleção de <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> objetos.</xref:Systems.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator%601> objetos que podem ser utilizados para iterar através da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a specified object at the specified index in a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Insere um objeto especificado no índice especificado numa coleção de <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index number that specifies where to insert the object into the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de índice que especifica onde pretende inserir o objeto à coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> for the added object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> para o objeto adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> from a collection at the given index.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> de uma coleção no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to be returned.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item a ser devolvido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> at that index.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> nesse índice.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueCollection.CollectionChanged"></xref> event when items in the collection are added, removed, or resorted.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueCollection.CollectionChanged"> </xref> eventos quando são adicionados, removidos ou reordenados itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Event arguments that contain information about the change in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Argumentos de eventos que contêm informações sobre a alteração na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> object that contains the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o principal <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> objeto que contém a coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> of the parent.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> do principal.

trans-unit.source: Removes the object from the collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Remove o objeto da coleção de <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The host needs to ensure that the PropertyValue is invalid after the object is removed.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião tem de garantir que o PropertyValue inválido depois de remover o objeto.

trans-unit.source: The item to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O item a remover da coleção.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if removal is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a remoção for bem-sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the object from the collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Remove o objeto da coleção de <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> objetos no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item a remover.

trans-unit.source: Recalculates the indexes in a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects after an existing item is moved to a new position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Recalcula os índices de uma coleção de <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> objetos depois de um item existente é movido para uma nova posição na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The current position index of the object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice da posição atual do objeto na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index position to which the item is moved.
trans-unit.target: A posição de índice para a qual o item é movido.

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed <xref:Systems.Collections.IEnumerator> for a collection of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um tipo seguro <xref:Systems.Collections.IEnumerator>para uma coleção de <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> objetos.</xref:Systems.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>objetos que podem ser utilizados para iterar através da coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>
